::Rodimus Prime::

Roddy had been hopeing for a situation like this to arise. Nightlight 
was now laying with him, as he held her to him tightly. In all his 
years with the Autobots and the Maximals Rodimus had relationships 
with a few femmes, but none did he have deeper feeling for then 
Nightlight. Not even Arcee.

Rodimus Prime: I love you so much...

OOC: Ok Airly, it's up too you how to procede with this. Should they 
just do more of the same, or move on too things we cant actually post 
about in detail?
